name: MagicballRemote
tagline: Arduino based ir Remote to control a magicball
body:
### MafraLab MagicBall Remote Control
We've created this project in order to interface with a discontinued product called MagicBall.

![MafraLab MagicBall](http://www.mafralab.org/wp-content/gallery/festival-in/dsc_0229.jpg)

### What you need
-A magic ball similar to the one presented on the above picture
-Arduino
-IR Led
-A small value resistor

### How to connect the IR Led and the Arduino

[MagicBall Remote Schematic](http://123d.circuits.io/circuits/563671-magicball-remote)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
